subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-501 Created
body: Dear Sir, We acknowledge receipt of PO 2025-501 for 1,000 pcs cotton T-shirts in Navy. Cutting starts tomorrow; kindly confirm if the attached shade card is approved.

subject: Re: PO 2025-501 – Shade Approval Pending
body: Hi Sir, Awaiting your confirmation on the Navy lab-dip attached so we can proceed to dyeing.

subject: Re: PO 2025-501 – Dyeing Delay
body: Dear Sir, Continuous rain has slowed drying at the dye house, causing a 2-day delay. Revised dispatch date is 30 Jul.

subject: Re: PO 2025-501 – Packed & Ready
body: Greetings, All 1,000 pcs are packed. Packing list and invoice INV-501 attached; please share the courier docket once booked.

subject: Re: PO 2025-501 – Courier Tracking
body: Hi Sir, Shipment handed to BlueDart AWB BD123456789. ETA your warehouse 02 Aug; kindly confirm upon delivery.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-502 Created
body: Respected Sir, PO 2025-502 for 600 pcs linen shirts acknowledged. Production begins 25 Jul.

subject: Re: PO 2025-502 – Tailor Master Unwell
body: Respected Sir, Our tailor master is unwell today, causing a 1-day stitching delay; we will compensate with overtime tomorrow.

subject: Re: PO 2025-502 – Fabric Quality Issue
body: Hi Sir, Fabric GSM is 3 % below spec. Please advise whether to proceed or await replacement.

subject: Re: PO 2025-502 – Goods Packed
body: Dear Sir, Goods packed (600 pcs). Truck arranged for 28 Jul evening; kindly confirm unloading slot.

subject: Re: PO 2025-502 – Invoice Attached
body: Greetings, Invoice INV-502 and e-way bill attached. Request 30 % balance before dispatch.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-503 Created
body: Hello Sir, Acknowledged PO 2025-503 for 800 pcs printed rayon tops; production plan attached.

subject: Re: PO 2025-503 – Print File Needed
body: Dear Sir, Artwork for style WRT-18 missing; please resend the .ai file.

subject: Re: PO 2025-503 – Partial Packed
body: Hello Sir, First lot of 400 pcs packed. Do we ship partial or wait for balance?

subject: Re: PO 2025-503 – Truck Scheduled
body: Greetings, Full order ready; truck KA01AB1234 departs 29 Jul 06:00. ETA 30 Jul; kindly arrange gate pass.

subject: Re: PO 2025-503 – Invoice & PL
body: Dear Sir, Invoice INV-503 and packing list attached; please acknowledge receipt.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-504 Created
body: Hi Sir, PO 2025-504 for 1,200 pcs interlock leggings confirmed. Cutting starts today.

subject: Re: PO 2025-504 – Power-Cut Delay
body: Dear Sir, Frequent power cuts have slowed stitching; revised finish date is 01 Aug.

subject: Re: PO 2025-504 – Advance Pending
body: Hello Sir, Advance payment INR 2,00,000 is pending; kindly release to continue work.

subject: Re: PO 2025-504 – Part Shipment Packed
body: Greetings, We packed 600 pcs; awaiting balance fabric to complete the order.

subject: Re: PO 2025-504 – Invoice Attached
body: Dear Sir, Part-shipment invoice INV-504 attached; please process payment.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-505 Created
body: Dear Sir, Thank you for PO 2025-505 (5,000 m viscose fabric). Greige inspection report attached.

subject: Re: PO 2025-505 – Loom Breakdown
body: Hi Sir, Two looms are down; output reduced 20 %. Expect a 3-day delay.

subject: Re: PO 2025-505 – Dye-Lab Approval
body: Hello Sir, Lab dip LDP-505 in Cobalt ready; need your approval to proceed.

subject: Re: PO 2025-505 – Dispatch Advice
body: Greetings, 200 rolls packed on pallets; vehicle GJ05XY6789 scheduled tonight.

subject: Re: PO 2025-505 – Invoice & LR
body: Dear Sir, Invoice INV-505 and lorry receipt attached for your records.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-506 Created
body: Hello Sir, PO 2025-506 for 300 hand-loom dupattas received; dyeing slots booked.

subject: Re: PO 2025-506 – Yarn Delay
body: Dear Sir, Dyed yarn arriving late from supplier; weaving schedule shifted by 2 days.

subject: Re: PO 2025-506 – Sample Approval
body: Hi Sir, Pre-production sample images attached; kindly approve to proceed.

subject: Re: PO 2025-506 – Weaving Completed
body: Greetings, Weaving done; finishing underway. ETA dispatch 03 Aug.

subject: Re: PO 2025-506 – Dispatch Scheduled
body: Dear Sir, All 300 pcs packed. Courier DTDC AWB D12345673; invoice INV-506 attached.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-507 Created
body: Dear Sir, Acknowledged PO 2025-507 for 750 pcs polo shirts; size breakup attached for confirmation.

subject: Re: PO 2025-507 – Size Confirmation Received
body: Hello Sir, Thanks for confirming sizes; fabric cutting has started.

subject: Re: PO 2025-507 – Embroidery Machine Issue
body: Hi Sir, Embroidery machine maintenance needed; minor delay anticipated.

subject: Re: PO 2025-507 – Goods Ready for QC
body: Greetings, All pieces stitched and pressed; awaiting your QC visit or video call approval.

subject: Re: PO 2025-507 – Invoice & Dispatch
body: Dear Sir, QC passed. Invoice INV-507 and packing list attached; truck leaves 01 Aug.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-508 Created
body: Hi Sir, PO 2025-508 for 900 pcs kids joggers booked; 50 % advance requested to start knitting.

subject: Re: PO 2025-508 – Advance Received
body: Dear Sir, Advance received; knitting commenced this evening.

subject: Re: PO 2025-508 – Dye-House Queue
body: Hello Sir, Dye house slot booked for 28 Jul; overall timeline unchanged.

subject: Re: PO 2025-508 – Packed 900 pcs
body: Greetings, Entire order packed; carton list attached. Please share transporter details.

subject: Re: PO 2025-508 – Tracking Details
body: Dear Sir, Shipment via VRL LR V45678901; invoice INV-508 attached for your reference.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-509 Created
body: Respected Sir, Received PO 2025-509 for 500 pcs Chikankari kurtis; thread chart will be shared by EOD.

subject: Re: PO 2025-509 – Thread Color Approval
body: Hi Sir, Thread chart attached; kindly approve shade #17 Ivory.

subject: Re: PO 2025-509 – Artisans on Leave
body: Dear Sir, Festival leave for artisans on 27-28 Jul will pause production for 2 days.

subject: Re: PO 2025-509 – Production Resumed
body: Greetings, Work resumed; expected completion 05 Aug.

subject: Re: PO 2025-509 – Dispatch Plan
body: Hello Sir, Request approval to ship 250 pcs on 06 Aug to meet your sales event deadline.

subject: Fwd: Purchase Order 2025-510 Created
body: Hi Sir, PO 2025-510 for 1,500 m block-print cotton fabric confirmed; screen burning starts tomorrow.

subject: Re: PO 2025-510 – Screen Approval
body: Dear Sir, Strike-off attached; please approve before bulk printing.

subject: Re: PO 2025-510 – Monsoon Humidity
body: Hello Sir, High humidity is slowing drying; recommend adding 24 hours to timeline.

subject: Re: PO 2025-510 – Roll Inspection Report
body: Greetings, Inspection report shows 97.8 % A-grade. Kindly acknowledge.

subject: Re: PO 2025-510 – Final Invoice & LR
body: Dear Sir, Invoice INV-510 and lorry receipt RJ11PQ2345 attached; awaiting payment confirmation.
